attributes.additional_details:
Recently I have found that there is alot of talk about EC parliment considering banning modified cars and some restorations of classic cars.

"EC parliament that will prevent any modifying and will, currently, render already modified cars illegal".

For 90% of people modifying cars and restoring cars is a hobby that we also stick to the law whilst doing.
We work hard to enjoy life and what do we get , parliments trying to stop what we enjoy .
It is completely outrageous.
Parliment need to listen to our views and our side of the argument .
